name: Lumen (itch) (SquidCastle)
description:
Lumen is a third-person adventure game produced by Cornell University’s Risley Hall freshmen in a week. You are an unnamed protagonist in a world full of darkness carrying its only light source, accompanied by a talking shadow protecting you for unknown reasons. Can you brighten the world or will you perish in the dark?

Currently Supported for Windows and MacOS Downloadable and WebGL

Updates and expansions in the future. Thank you.
